title: Sourdough's COVID-19 Comeback
description: A micro-lesson that makes Sourdough's COVID-19 Comeback usable.

hook.text: In March 2020, flour vanished from supermarket shelves. Social media flooded with sourdough selfies.

twist.text: Most pandemic bakers quit within months. But a lasting 15% increase in home baking persisted post-lockdown.

punchline.text: A virus brought back the world's oldest comfort food.
